edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.reports
Class OutputTraceabilityMatrix

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.reports.OutputTraceabilityMatrix

public class OutputTraceabilityMatrix
extends java.lang.Object

Used to output a traceability matrix. Currently outputs to HTML, but should be able to be modified to output in some other format without having to change anything in any other classes.

Author:
molerjc
